title: Stuck at home, Gophers’ Morgan continues to ‘strive for mastery’ of offense
description: Quarterback Tanner Morgan, along with his Minnesota Gophers teammates and coaching staff, has had to adjust to the lack of spring football.
content:
Quarterback Tanner Morgan was at his house in Union, Ky., enjoying spring break when the University of Minnesota canceled all in-person classes March 12 due to the coronavirus.
Like most of the country — and world — the quarterback is stuck at home.
Thankfu… [+3058 chars]
